title: Salk: Zero Is the Key
description: An explosive, action-packed adventure story for the whole family that will force its readers to perceive the world in a whole new way.  Declan and Dalya are two ordinary American teens. On a crisp autumn night, they discover a sinkhole which leaves them with powers they cannot possibly explain. But when they realize that their lives are in grave danger, the eighth graders embark upon an epic quest to find the source and purpose of their powers. With riddles and clues, the twins are guided by a mysterious group of people to mesmerizing sites throughout Europe, Asia, and the Americas. While learning about history and mathematics, ancient secrets about the origin of the human race unfold before them, secrets that will change their lives forever.  Meanwhile, another more sinister group is hunting the twins at all cost.
author: Robert J. Guerrera
